org.ccnx.ccn.config.ConfigurationException

org.ccnx.ccn.config.ConfigurationException Class Reference

A marker exception thrown to indicate some problem with the user or system configuration, that cannot be overcome without some intervention to manually correct the problem. More...

Detailed Description

A marker exception thrown to indicate some problem with the user or system configuration, that cannot be overcome without some intervention to manually correct the problem.
